mean_en: an arrangement of the parts of something or a group of things; the form or shape that this arrangement produces; the equipment and programs that form a computer system and the way that these are set up to run
sentence: Our new computer network has a star-shaped configuration.
sentence_trans: 我们新的计算机网络是星状的布局。
word_etyma: con共同 + figur=figure描绘 + ation表名词 → 构造，布局
